page.title: 04INTERESTING PEOPLE -OTLEY
page.content:
{OTLEY POLICE FORCE Otley Police Station is an area one. Unemployment causes petty crime, house break-ins,and vandalism to be rising in the area.A new bypass helps to remove some of the heavy traffic from Otley so easing the Police's job.
{HEADMASTER OF PRINCE HENRY'S SCHOOL Mr.Michael Franklin was born in August 1939.He always wanted to be a teacher.He is a qualified Tennis Coach and enjoys keeping fit and playing golf.He is new to the school.
{MR.DAVID A.JONES He is the inspector for Bradford,in craft and design.The design centre in Burley is unique.Teachers go there to be assessed.
